keyMoments.title: Jerry Confronts Sanji on the Sea Train
keyMoments.description: Jerry, CP6 agent and head of security for the seventh passenger car, introduces himself to Sanji as a famous undefeated boxing champion from the South Blue.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of a CP6 agent in the series, establishing additional World Government security protecting Robin.
keyMoments.quote: I'm Jerry, a famous, undefeated champion known for my boxing skills in the South Blue!

keyMoments.title: Jerry Defeated by Sanji's Brochette
keyMoments.description: Despite his reputation and unique yoga fighting style, Jerry is effortlessly defeated by Sanji's Brochette technique in a single attack.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the power gap between CP6 agents and the Straw Hat Pirates, establishing Sanji's combat superiority.

abilities.description: Rapid-fire boxing punches delivered so fast that it appears Jerry has multiple arms attacking simultaneously.
Boxing punches delivered while in a compressed yoga position with legs positioned behind head.

reveals.information: Claims to be famous undefeated boxing champion from South Blue, specifically from Karate Island
Uses yoga positioning to fight in confined spaces despite extreme height

keyMoments.title: Sanji's Letter Reveals His Mission
keyMoments.description: Sanji's letter to Nami reveals that he successfully boarded the Sea Train with Usopp and Franky to pursue Robin, leaving a Den Den Mushi for communication.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Sanji's quick thinking and initiative in acting independently to protect a crew member.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Begins Fighting Government Agents
keyMoments.description: Sanji infiltrates the Sea Train and attacks government agents with powerful kicks, undeterred by gun threats.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Sanji's courage in facing overwhelming odds alone to rescue Robin.

keyMoments.title: Sanji Debuts Brochette Technique
keyMoments.description: Sanji unveils the Brochette technique, defeating CP6 agent Jerry effortlessly by jumping over him and dropping downward while spinning like a drill.
keyMoments.significance: First appearance of Brochette, expanding Sanji's Black Leg Style arsenal and demonstrating his growth as a fighter.

abilities.description: Sanji jumps over his opponent and drops downward while spinning like a drill, striking with his extended leg aimed directly at the target. Named after the French word for skewer.

keyMoments.title: Paulie Rescues Nami from Flooding
keyMoments.description: Paulie uses his rope abilities to rescue Nami and the conductors when Aqua Laguna floods the train station.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the immediate danger of Aqua Laguna and Paulie's heroic nature.

keyMoments.title: Nami Receives Sanji's Letter
keyMoments.description: A messenger delivers Sanji's letter revealing he, Usopp, and Franky are aboard the Sea Train, along with a Den Den Mushi for communication.
keyMoments.significance: Nami becomes the communication hub for coordinating the scattered Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Nami Takes Command of the Situation
keyMoments.description: Upon learning she missed the train, Nami's shoulders tremble with suppressed rage. She focuses on finding Luffy and Zoro first, showing strategic thinking under pressure.
keyMoments.significance: Displays Nami's growth as a leader and her ability to prioritize despite emotional distress.

keyMoments.title: Nami Discovers Luffy Trapped
keyMoments.description: While searching, Nami spots and identifies Luffy wedged between two buildings, still unable to free himself.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Nami's determination to locate her captain despite the approaching Aqua Laguna.

keyMoments.title: Paulie Rescues Nami from the Flood
keyMoments.description: Paulie uses his rope manipulation abilities to save Nami and the conductors from drowning in the Aqua Laguna flood waters.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Paulie's heroism and quick thinking in crisis situations.

keyMoments.title: Paulie Explains Aqua Laguna Warning Signs
keyMoments.description: Paulie explains that the distance the ocean water recedes indicates the severity of the approaching Aqua Laguna, and this year's recession is abnormally large.
keyMoments.significance: Provides critical information about the impending disaster and establishes local Water 7 knowledge.
keyMoments.quote: Aqua Laguna is different this year!
